item.title: Shiny Central Limit Theorem
item.author: contact@datatrigger.org (Vincent Le Goualher)
item.description: The central limit theorem is one of the greatest hits in the history of statistics. I wrote a little Shiny app to visualize it and to illustrate its infamous “counterexample”, Cauchy distribution: https://datatrigger.shinyapps.io/CLT_Visualization/.
